wandascore-tile-title: Title displayed on the WandaScore tile
wandascore-tile-loading: Message shown while the score is being loaded in the tile
wandascore-tile-error: Error message shown when the score fails to load in the tile
wandascore-tile-click-details: Tooltip or instruction text shown in the tile to view detailed review
wandascore-review-title: Title of the detailed review page. Followed by the page name.
wandascore-review-loading: Message shown while analyzing page content. Explains that the process may take some time.
wandascore-review-error: Error message shown when the detailed review cannot be loaded
wandascore-review-score-label: Label for the overall quality score section
wandascore-review-refresh: Button text to refresh/regenerate the score
wandascore-review-timestamp: Label for the timestamp showing when the page was last reviewed
wandascore-review-bias-label: Label for the bias detection metric
wandascore-review-llm-label: Label for the metric showing whether content is human-written (vs AI-generated)
wandascore-review-language-label: Label for the language quality metric
wandascore-review-grammar-label: Label for the grammar and spelling quality metric
wandascore-form-legend: Legend text for the form used to select a page to review
wandascore-form-page-label: Label for the page title input field
wandascore-form-submit: Submit button text to view the review
wandascore-error-page-not-found:
Error message shown when the requested page is not found. Parameters:
* $1 - the page title that was not found
wandascore-error-generation-failed: Error message shown when score generation fails, with suggestion to check Wanda extension configuration
